movies.title: Jawan
movies.cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Nayanthara, Vijay Sethupathi
movies.description: An action-packed thriller where a mysterious man sets out to right the wrongs of society with high-octane stunts, powerful emotions, and gripping drama that will keep audiences on the edge of their seats.

movies.title: Leo
movies.description: A café owner’s mysterious past resurfaces, dragging him into a violent world of crime and vengeance. Packed with intense action and unexpected twists, Leo is a battle between morality and survival.

movies.title: RRR
movies.cast: Ram Charan, Jr. NTR, Alia Bhatt
movies.description: An epic tale of two revolutionaries who fight against the British Raj while testing their unbreakable bond of friendship. With breathtaking visuals, heart-pounding action, and unforgettable music, RRR is a cinematic spectacle.

movies.title: KGF: Chapter 2
movies.description: Rocky rises as a feared leader while battling deadly enemies and striving to maintain his empire at Kolar Gold Fields. A saga of power, betrayal, and survival with larger-than-life action sequences.

movies.title: Pushpa 2: The Rule
movies.cast: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil
movies.description: Pushpa returns stronger than ever as he takes on new rivals and asserts his dominance over the red sandalwood empire. With fiery dialogues, thrilling action, and raw emotions, The Rule continues Pushpa’s legendary rise.

movies.title: Pathaan
movies.cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, John Abraham
movies.description: A spy embarks on a dangerous mission to save India from a deadly private terror group planning mass destruction. Featuring breathtaking stunts, exotic locations, and stylish action, Pathaan redefines spy thrillers.

movies.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
movies.description: A young man learns about his royal heritage and sets out on an epic journey to reclaim his father’s kingdom. A story of bravery, betrayal, and destiny with jaw-dropping visuals and a grand musical score.

movies.title: Baahubali: The Conclusion
movies.cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamannaah
movies.description: The breathtaking conclusion to an epic saga, revealing why Kattappa killed Baahubali and the final battle for the throne. A cinematic masterpiece of emotions, action, and grandeur.

movies.title: Vikram
movies.cast: Kamal Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Fahadh Faasil
movies.description: A retired cop is pulled back into the shadows to fight against ruthless gangs and uncover hidden truths. With stylish filmmaking and thrilling action, Vikram blends raw intensity with gripping storytelling.

movies.title: Master
movies.description: A charismatic professor is sent to a juvenile school where he clashes with a ruthless gangster exploiting the children. A mix of mass entertainment, gripping action, and powerful performances.

events.title: Chennai Food Festival
events.description: Indulge in authentic Chennai street food and local delicacies by the beach with live music and fun activities. From spicy chaats to sizzling grills, this food festival is a paradise for foodies.

events.title: Guitar Workshop
events.description: Hands-on guitar basics for beginners in a friendly environment with expert guidance and interactive practice. Perfect for those who’ve always wanted to strum their first song and build confidence.

events.title: Indie Band Night
events.description: Experience electrifying performances by Chennai’s emerging indie bands with food, drinks, and non-stop music. A vibrant evening that celebrates the city’s underground music culture.

events.title: Chess Tournament
events.description: Compete in an exciting chess tournament with prizes, trophies, and a chance to meet fellow chess enthusiasts. A day of strategy, focus, and fun for players of all skill levels.

events.title: Bird Watching Morning
events.description: Spot rare bird species with expert naturalists while exploring the serene marshlands of Pallikaranai. A peaceful morning activity for nature lovers, photographers, and explorers.
